Class BulletComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.Component
      • com.artemis.PooledComponent
        • gg.al.logic.component.BulletComponent

  • public class BulletComponent
extends com.artemis.PooledComponent
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 29.05.2017.
    Component describing a bullet.
